template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

div.div: Sign Up in quick steps, choose your payment method and you are all set to go
Choose from a wide range of finest restaurants & cuisines available across the United Kingdom & Scotland
Book more for your guests with less effort. Fast, easy & confirmed bookings guaranteed

t.div: Capital Centric offers a personal and bespoke booking service for groups of any size and most budgets and we are totally dedicated to placing restaurant groups across the UK and in Scotland. Read More..

p.em:
“FIT for Purpose is the ideal online platform for travel professionals to assist in offering clients a memorable add-on for their trip to London.
The tool offers a wide range of restaurants including all styles and cuisines, from typical English pubs, to high-end restaurants.
The handling of the website is easy and fast so that a booking is quickly made and administrated.
A big advantage is the individual adaptability of each booking – options range from meal types and menu choices over date and time adjustments and special dietary requirements.
All bookings made can be easily monitored via a booking overview and where necessary amendments can be done easily which only takes seconds. Additionally the website also offers the possibility to monitor payments and download detailed invoices.
Altogether, we can highly recommend a co-operation with FIT for Purpose to anyone who wishes to add value to their London products!”
"FIT for Purpose an ideal booking portal for us. Variety of popular restaurants you can choose from, without any hassle. It is also very easy system to navigate."
"Congratulations!  Very good website- FIT for Purpose - a nice and easy way to find a good selection of value-for- money restaurants."

“I find FIT for Purpose a great tool, as it allows you to look for restaurants by city, area, name, cuisine type even by budget. Just choose what you need and the results are in front of you in a few seconds. It is the quickest way to offer and book just the right kind of restaurant for our clients. I’ve been using it on and off since the tool became available and find it really saves loads of time and worries”

"I believe FIT for Purpose (FFP) has played a great role in bridging as a platform to quote or book online various types of restaurants for our clients.
FFP's huge database of restaurants has provided further evidence of just how far the company has progressed in recent times - a perfect blend for local market requirements and well worth.
I have found  the FFP experience something more than an opportunity to enjoy an excellent meals for our clients with wider choices.
Look forward to see more and more restaurants in its database and I wish all the best for its future endeavours."

"FIT for Purpose is a unique tool for us as a DMC. It allow us to access to a range of venues and menus to view and use without having to contact venues directly where often we are unable to get hold anyone who can help us with prices and menu samples.
Being able to issue vouchers for smaller parties gives us a competitive edge and allows us to offer our overseas clients a service we found difficult to do before.
The service is easy to use as the booking and payment process is quick and uncomplicated making the whole experience less laborious and therefore allowing us to work faster and more efficiently. Perfect !"

template.name: Restaurant Reservations For The Travel Trade

div.h2: Watch our video to see how ‘FIT For Purpose’ can help your business today!
